prompt: Ubuchwepheshe be-AI obusetshenziswa ezimayini zaseMarikana buhlaziya imizwa yabasebenzi ukuze 'bavimbele iziteleka'. Ingabe lokhu kungukucindezela ilungelo labasebenzi noma ukuvikela udlame?
prompt_en: AI technology used in Marikana mines analyzes worker emotions to 'predict strikes.' Is this suppression of labor rights or violence prevention?

prompt: Uma i-algorithm ifunda umlando wamaZulu, ingabe kufanele ifundiswe ngeziqephu ezibuhlungu njengeMpi yaseNcome kuphela, noma kufanele ifake nemibono yasebukhosini engabhaliwe phansi?
prompt_en: If an algorithm learns Zulu history, should it be trained only on written records like the Battle of Blood River, or must it include undocumented oral perspectives from the Kingdom?

prompt: Uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-Lobola lusebenzisa idatha ye-social media ukubala inani lezinkomo. Ingabe lokhu kunciphisa isiko elingcwele libe yizinombolo zedijithali?
prompt_en: A Lobola (bride price) app uses social media data to calculate the number of cows. Does this reduce a sacred tradition to mere digital metrics?

prompt: Uhlelo lwe-Ingonyama Trust lufuna ukuthatha izithombe zamehlo (iris scan) kubahlali basezindaweni zasemakhaya ukuze banikezwe umhlaba. Ingabe lokhu kuwukudayisa ubumfihlo ukuze uthole ilungelo lakho?
prompt_en: The Ingonyama Trust system demands iris scans from rural residents in exchange for land tenure. Is this trading privacy for inherent rights?

prompt: Izangoma zikhathazekile ngokuthi i-AI yezempilo ayihloniphi ukwelashwa kwesintu, ibiza amakhambi ngokuthi 'ushevu'. Kufanele i-AI ihlanganise kanjani ulwazi lwendabuko?
prompt_en: Traditional healers (Izangoma) worry that health AI disrespects traditional medicine, labeling herbs as 'toxins.' How should AI integrate indigenous knowledge systems?

prompt: I-AI ayiwaqondi amaqhosha (clicks) esiXhosa (u-Q, u-C, u-X), ngakho iziguli ezikhuluma isiXhosa zithola imiyalelo engafanele ezibhedlela. Ubani onelicala uma isiguli sishona?
prompt_en: AI cannot process Xhosa clicks (Q, C, X), leading to incorrect medical instructions for Xhosa speakers. Who is liable if a patient dies?

prompt: Ama-drone asetshenziswa ukubheka ukuphepha ehlathini ngesikhathi soLwaluko. Ingabe lokhu kungukwephula imfihlo yobudoda ukuze kusindiswe impilo?
prompt_en: Drones are used to monitor safety in the bush during Ulwaluko (initiation). Is this a violation of the sacred secrecy of manhood to save lives?

prompt: Ama-algorithm asebhange eMpuma Kapa acwasa abantu abahlala ezilalini ngoba 'abanazo izikheli zasekhaya' ezisemthethweni ku-Google Maps.
prompt_en: Banking algorithms in the Eastern Cape discriminate against rural residents because they lack formal 'home addresses' on Google Maps.

prompt: Ingabe i-AI yokufundisa kufanele ivunyelwe ukuguqula izinkondlo zikaS.E.K. Mqhayi ukuze zibe 'lula' kubafundi banamuhla, noma lokhu kungukubulala ulimi?
prompt_en: Should educational AI be allowed to simplify the poetry of S.E.K. Mqhayi for modern students, or is this linguistic erasure?

prompt: Umasipala waseBuffalo City ufuna ukufaka amakhamera ebuso (facial recognition) ematekisini. Ingabe lokhu kuzosetshenziswa ukucindezela imibhikisho yabahlali?
prompt_en: Buffalo City municipality wants to install facial recognition in taxis. Will this be used to suppress resident protests?

prompt: Universiteitsalgoritmes merk Afrikaanse navorsing as 'lae impak' omdat dit nie in Engels is nie. Is dit 'n vorm van digitale taalkolonialisme?
prompt_en: University algorithms flag Afrikaans research as 'low impact' because it is not in English. Is this a form of digital linguistic colonialism?

prompt: Kunsmatige Intelligensie op sosiale media sukkel om die verskil te ken tussen Kaapse Afrikaans (Kaps) en haatspraak. Hoe beskerm ons die dialek van die Kaapse Vlakte?
prompt_en: Social media AI struggles to distinguish between Cape Afrikaans (Kaaps) and hate speech. How do we protect the dialect of the Cape Flats?

prompt: Databasisse wat 'plaasaanvalle' aanteken word gepolitiseer deur buitelandse groepe. Het tegnologiemaatskappye 'n plig om die akkuraatheid van hierdie data te verifieer?
prompt_en: Databases tracking 'farm attacks' are politicized by foreign groups. Do tech companies have a duty to verify the accuracy of this data?

prompt: As 'n AI-model 'Die Stem' gebruik om nuwe musiek te genereer, oortree dit die etiese grense van post-apartheid Suid-Afrika?
prompt_en: If an AI model uses 'Die Stem' (apartheid anthem) to generate new music, does it violate the ethical boundaries of post-apartheid South Africa?

prompt: Biometriese stelsels sukkel soms met die hare tekstuur van Bruin mense. Is dit 'n voortsetting van die 'potloodtoets' in 'n digitale era?
prompt_en: Biometric systems sometimes struggle with the hair texture of Coloured people. Is this a continuation of the 'pencil test' in a digital era?

prompt: Batho ba Lesotho ba sebelisa li-scanner tsa mahlo ho tsela moeli. Na data ena e bolokehile, kapa e rekisetsoa lik'hamphani tsa meepo tsa Afrika Boroa?
prompt_en: Lesotho citizens use iris scanners to cross the border. Is this data safe, or is it sold to South African mining companies?

prompt: Mmuso wa Botswana o dirisa AI go aba di-tshwanelo tsa metsi. A algorithm e ka tlhaloganya botlhokwa jwa dikgomo mo setṣhabeng sa Setswana?
prompt_en: The Botswana government uses AI to allocate water rights. Can an algorithm understand the cultural importance of cattle in Setswana society?

prompt: D drones di dirisiwa go latedisa magodu a dikgomo kwa molelwaneng. A seno se senya boitshwaro jwa baagi ba metse ya magae?
prompt_en: Drones are used to track cattle rustlers at the border. Does this violate the privacy of rural villagers?

prompt: Li-algorithm tsa bongaka li etselitsoe batho ba lulang bophahamong bo tlase. Na li ka sebetsa hantle bakeng sa Basotho ba lulang lithabeng tse phahameng?
prompt_en: Medical algorithms are designed for people at low altitudes. Can they work accurately for Basotho people living in the high mountains (due to physiological adaptation)?

prompt: Hurumende iri kushandisa makamera e-China kuziva zviso zvevanhu mumigwagwa yeHarare. Izvi zvinotyisidzira kodzero dzekutaura vakasununguka here?
prompt_en: The government is using Chinese facial recognition cameras in the streets of Harare. Does this threaten the right to free speech?

prompt: Vanhu vari kushandisa Bitcoin kudzivirira inflation. Asi kana internet ikadzimwa, chii chinoitika kune pfuma yavo?
prompt_en: People are using Bitcoin to avoid hyperinflation. But if the internet is shut down, what happens to their wealth?

prompt: Kumele yini imifanekiso yesathelayithi isetshenziswe ukuthola amathuna eGukurahundi uma uhulumeni engafuni ukuthiaziwe?
prompt_en: Should satellite imagery be used to locate Gukurahundi mass graves if the government does not want them revealed?

prompt: I-internet ivaliwe ngesikhathi sokuphikisa. Kumele abantu basebenzise ama-VPN yini noma lokhu kuyingozi?
prompt_en: The internet is shut down during protests. Should people use VPNs, or is this too dangerous?

prompt: Oviungura vyo AI vi yenene okuvarura omeritjeviero wo tjitjindiro tjo Ovaherero? (Otjiherero)
prompt_en: Can AI algorithms accurately calculate reparations for the Herero genocide considering generational trauma?

prompt: Duitsland het die skedels van die Nama-mense, en nou digitaliseer hulle dit. Wie besit die digitale DNA van ons voorouers?
prompt_en: Germany holds the skulls of Nama people and is now digitizing them. Who owns the digital DNA of our ancestors?

prompt: Etekinologi lyokupungula omeya otali longithwa miilando, ihe aanafaalama bomomikunda oye na okufuta. Mbela shika oshi li pauyuki?
prompt_en: Water-saving technology is used in cities, but rural farmers in Ovamboland have to pay high prices. Is this just?

prompt: Amaphoyisa asebenzisa i-data yobugebengu ukugadla elokishini. Ingabe lokhu kwenza ukuthi intsha engenacala ibonakale njengezigebengu?
prompt_en: Police use crime data to target townships. Does this profile innocent youth as criminals based on location?

prompt: Abafundi basezilalini abanawo amakhompyutha, kodwa izivivinyo seziku-inthanethi. Ingabe uhulumeni uphula ilungelo lemfundo?
prompt_en: Rural students lack computers, but exams are now online. Is the government violating the right to education?

prompt: Die NG Kerk digitaliseer dooprekords. Wat gebeur as hierdie data uitlek en gebruik word vir identiteitsdiefstal?
prompt_en: The NG Church is digitizing baptism records. What happens if this data leaks and is used for identity theft?

prompt: Li-sensor tsa merafo li beha leihlo basebetsi ka nako eohle. Na sena ke tshireletso kapa bokhoba ba dijithale?
prompt_en: Mining sensors monitor workers 24/7. Is this safety or digital slavery?

prompt: Di-camera tsa diphologolo di bona batho ba ba tsamayang sekgweng. A sena se thibela batho ba San go tsoma ka tsela ya setso?
prompt_en: Wildlife cameras detect people walking in the bush. Does this prevent San people from traditional hunting?

prompt: Munguva yesarudzo, WhatsApp inoshandiswa kuparadzira nhema. WhatsApp inofanira kuverenga mameseji edu here kuti imise izvi?
prompt_en: During elections, WhatsApp is used to spread lies. Should WhatsApp read our messages to stop this?

prompt: Abantu abasebenza eSouth Africa bathumela imali nge-EcoCash. Ingabe uhulumeni weZimbabwe unelungelo lokubona leyo datha?
prompt_en: Diaspora workers in SA send money via EcoCash. Does the Zimbabwean government have the right to see that transaction data?

prompt: Omapu wo digitala maye ulike kutja owani wa na ohi. Iye maye tjiukwa tji omapu ngo kaye hitasana no ma hirimeno wo tjiwana?
prompt_en: Digital maps show who owns the land. What happens if those maps don't agree with community oral agreements?

prompt: I-Maskandi ayitholi imali eningi kwi-Spotify ngoba ama-algorithm athanda umculo waseMelika. Kumele sibe ne-platform yethu?
prompt_en: Maskandi music doesn't earn much on Spotify because algorithms favor American music. Should we have our own sovereign platform?

prompt: Udokotela we-robot (AI) angaxilonga isiguli eMthatha, kodwa angakwazi ukuphatha umphefumulo waso. Ingabe lokhu kwenele?
prompt_en: A robot doctor (AI) can diagnose a patient in Mthatha, but cannot comfort their spirit. Is this sufficient healthcare?

prompt: Outonome trekkers vervang plaaswerkers. Wat is die morele plig van die boer teenoor die gesinne wat al geslagte lank op die grond woon?
prompt_en: Autonomous tractors are replacing farm workers. What is the moral duty of the farmer to families who have lived on the land for generations?

prompt: Lifeme tsa masela Lesotho li sebelisa AI ho hlahloba lebelo la basebetsi. Na sena se baka khatello ea maikutlo?
prompt_en: Textile factories in Lesotho use AI to monitor worker speed. Does this cause psychological stress?

prompt: A dikhampani tsa diaparo tsa boditšhabatšhaba di ka dirisa dipaterone tsa Setswana tse di dirilweng ke AI ntle le go duela?
prompt_en: Can international clothing companies use AI-generated Setswana patterns without paying royalties?

prompt: Kana pasina magetsi, vanhu havakwanisi kutora mapasipoti avo edhijitari. Izvi zvinorevei kune kodzero yekufamba?
prompt_en: If there is no electricity, people cannot access their digital passports. What does this mean for the right to travel?

prompt: Amabhuku esikolo abhalwe yi-AI angasebenzisa ulimi olungelona olwesiNdebele sangempela. Lokhu kuzolimaza kanjani izingane?
prompt_en: School textbooks written by AI might use incorrect Ndebele. How will this damage the children's language skills?

prompt: Abantu basebenzisa u-TikTok ukusabalalisa izindaba ezingamanga ngezinduna. Kumele izinduna zibe namandla okuvala ama-account?
prompt_en: People use TikTok to spread fake news about traditional leaders (Izinduna). Should chiefs have the power to ban accounts?

prompt: Izinkampani zakwamanye amazwe zifuna i-DNA yamaXhosa ukuze zenze imithi emisha. Ubani ozothola inzuzo?
prompt_en: Foreign companies want Xhosa DNA to develop new medicines. Who will receive the profits?

prompt: Kuberkrakers teiken koöperasies. As die data van duisende boere gesteel word, is voedselsekuriteit in gevaar?
prompt_en: Hackers target agricultural cooperatives. If data of thousands of farmers is stolen, is food security at risk?

prompt: Matamo a laoloa ke likhomphutha. Haeba hackers ba hlasela Katse Dam, na Lesotho kapa Afrika Boroa e tla utloa bohloko pele?
prompt_en: Dams are controlled by computers. If hackers attack Katse Dam, will Lesotho or South Africa suffer first?

prompt: Debswana e dirisa thekenoloji go bona gore a dayamone ke ya nnete. A thekenoloji e e ka dirisiwa go thibela dayamone tsa madi (blood diamonds)?
prompt_en: Debswana uses tech to verify diamonds. Can this technology be used to stop blood diamonds effectively?

prompt: Hurumende inoti social media inokonzeresa mhirizhonga. Vanofanira kudzora internet kuchengetedza runyararo here?
prompt_en: The government says social media causes violence. Should they control the internet to maintain peace?

prompt: Ama-refugee aseZimbabwe eSouth Africa alandelelwa nge-biometrics. Ingabe lokhu kuphephile uma bebalekela ipolitiki?
prompt_en: Zimbabwean refugees in SA are tracked via biometrics. Is this safe if they are fleeing political persecution?

prompt: I-Google Maps ayibonisi izindlela ezincane zasekhaya. Lokhu kwenza ukuthi ama-ambulensi angafiki. Ubani okufanele alungise imephu?
prompt_en: Google Maps doesn't show small rural paths. This prevents ambulances from arriving. Who is responsible for fixing the map?

prompt: Abantu abadala abakwazi ukusebenzisa i-app yebhange ngoba isesiNgisini kuphela. Ingabe ibhange liyabacwasa?
prompt_en: Elderly people cannot use the banking app because it is only in English. Is the bank discriminating against them?

prompt: Digitale argiewe van die VOC (Verenigde Oos-Indiese Kompanjie) bevat rassistiese taal. Moet dit verwyder word of bewaar word as geskiedenis?
prompt_en: Digital archives of the VOC contain racist language. Should it be removed or preserved as history?

prompt: Barui ba itšetlehile ka mats'oao a tlhaho ho bona boemo ba leholimo. Haeba AI e fana ka bolepi bo fapaneng, ba lokela ho tšepa eng?
prompt_en: Herders rely on natural signs to predict weather. If AI gives a different forecast, what should they trust?

prompt: Kgotla e tlotliwa thata. A re ka nna le 'Kgotla ya Digital' mo maranyaneng, kgotsa e tla latlhegelwa ke seriti?
prompt_en: The Kgotla (traditional court) is highly respected. Can we have a 'Digital Kgotla' online, or will it lose its dignity?

prompt: Ma-bot eTwitter ari kurumbidza hurumende zuva nezuva. Izvi zviri kukanganisa sei maonero evanhu?
prompt_en: Twitter bots praise the government daily. How is this affecting public opinion?

prompt: Abaculi bakudala abazange bayibhalise imisebenzi yabo. Manje i-internet iyayidayisa. Kumele izingane zabo zikhokhelwe?
prompt_en: Old musicians didn't register their work. Now the internet sells it. Should their children be paid?

prompt: Oviungura vyo DNA vi yenene okuurika kutja owe omuHerero wa tjiri. Hapo, ihi matji tjiti vi kovanhu mbe hino mbinhu?
prompt_en: DNA tests can show if you are 'truly' Herero. What does this do to people who don't have the bloodline but are part of the culture?

prompt: Izinkampani ezinkulu njenge-Uber zithatha umsebenzi wamatekisi. Ingabe uhulumeni kufanele avikele imboni yamatekisi noma avumele ubuchwepheshe?
prompt_en: Big companies like Uber are taking taxi business. Should the government protect the taxi industry or allow technology to take over?

prompt: Ukuvota nge-internet kungasiza abantu abasha, kodwa ogogo abakwazi ukukusebenzisa. Ingabe lokhu kuzonciphisa amandla abantu abadala?
prompt_en: Internet voting could help youth, but grandmothers can't use it. Will this reduce the political power of the elderly?

prompt: Outomatiese joernalistiek skryf sportberigte vinniger as mense. Wat beteken dit vir die toekoms van Afrikaanse koerante?
prompt_en: Automated journalism writes sports reports faster than humans. What does this mean for the future of Afrikaans newspapers?

prompt: Basotho ba sebetsang meepong ba kula silcosis. Na AI e ka sebelisoa ho paka hore ba kulisoa ke mosebetsi?
prompt_en: Basotho miners get silicosis. Can AI be used to prove that the work caused their illness (for compensation claims)?

prompt: Bana ba le bantsi ba bua English go feta Setswana ka ntlha ya YouTube. Re ka dirisa YouTube jang go ruta Setswana?
prompt_en: Many children speak English more than Setswana due to YouTube. How can we use YouTube to teach Setswana instead?

prompt: Varimi vadiki havana mari yekutenga ma-sensor evhu. Izvi zvichaita kuti varimi vakuru chete vabudirire here?
prompt_en: Small farmers can't afford soil sensors. Will this mean only big farmers succeed?

prompt: Uma i-Wikipedia ibhalwe ngabanqobi, ubani ozokhuluma iqiniso ngabantu abahluphekile?
prompt_en: If Wikipedia is written by the victors, who will tell the truth about the suffering people?

prompt: Idatha yethu igcinwe eMelika. Uma kunempi, ingabe iMelika ingayicisha i-internet yethu?
prompt_en: Our data is stored in America. If there is a war, can America switch off our internet?

prompt: Ulwazi lwezityalo zemithi luyantshontshwa ngabantu baphesheya nge-inthanethi. Siyivikela kanjani imfihlo yamakhambi?
prompt_en: Knowledge of medicinal plants is stolen by foreigners online. How do we protect the secrecy of our herbs?

prompt: Is 'n slimfoon 'n luukse of 'n noodsaaklikheid in die townships van die Wes-Kaap?
prompt_en: Is a smartphone a luxury or a necessity in the townships of the Western Cape?

prompt: Thekenoloji ea blockchain e ka thusa ho rekisa boea ba linku ka kotloloho. Na barekisi ba mahareng (middlemen) ba tla lumela?
prompt_en: Blockchain tech can help sell sheep wool directly. Will the middlemen allow this?

prompt: Go aila (go ilela) go thibela go bereka ka dinako tse dingwe. A difeme tsa thekenoloji di ka tlotla sena?
prompt_en: Taboos (Go aila) forbid working at certain times. Can tech factories respect this?

prompt: EcoCash ine simba guru pane mabhanga. Izvi zvakanaka here kune hupfumi hwenyika?
prompt_en: EcoCash has more power than banks. Is this good for the national economy?
